com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui

Class SpenSettingTextLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.settingui.SpenSettingTextLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent

    public class SpenSettingTextLayout
extends LinearLayout
    Text Setting View class

    3.0.0

      • SpenSettingTextLayout

        public SpenSettingTextLayout(Context context,
                     AttributeSet attrs,
                     int defStyle)
        Creates an SpenSettingTextLayout instance with the specified XML attributes.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        attrs - The XML attributes for the view.
        defStyle - The default style to apply to this view. Set to 0 to apply no style beyond what is included in the theme. This can be an attribute resource value retrieved from the current theme or an explicit style resource.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the context is null.
        Since:
        4.0.0

      • SpenSettingTextLayout

        public SpenSettingTextLayout(Context context,
                     String customImagePath,
                     HashMap<String,String> fontName,
                     RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Text Setting Layout does not support (RTL) Right To Left mirroring, therefore, please set layout direction View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR for its parent view so that SDK can have normal display and operation.
        Creates an SpenSettingTextLayout instance with the specified image path, font name, and relative layout. The following parameters must be not null.
        Parameters:
        context - [in] The Context for application.
        customImagePath - [in] The path to the image you want to use internally (String).
        fontName - [in] The font list.
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If input parameter is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • SpenSettingTextLayout

        @Deprecated
public SpenSettingTextLayout(Context context,
                                String customImagePath,
                                HashMap<String,String> fontName,
                                RelativeLayout relativeLayout,
                                float ratio)
        Deprecated. 
        This method is deprecated in version 4.0.0. Not supported anymore.
        please use SpenSettingTextLayout(Context, String, HashMap, RelativeLayout).
        Since:
        3.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(String customImagePath,
              HashMap<String,String> fontName,
              RelativeLayout relativeLayout)
        Initialize a SpenSettingTextLayout with the specified image path, font name, relative layout.
        it must be called when ONLY SpenSettingTextLayout instance with the specified XML attributes is used.
        Parameters:
        customImagePath - [in] The path to the image you want to use internally (String).
        fontName - [in] The font list.
        relativeLayout - [in] The upper of the Layout.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If input parameter is null.
        Since:
        4.0.0

        public void close()
        Close the Settings UI. Call this method before destroying the instance to prevent memory leaks.

      • setInfo

        public void setInfo(SpenSettingTextInfo settingInfo)
        Set the specified text settings information. The UI is refreshed based on these values.
        This API should be called when init Text setting view.
        Parameters:
        settingInfo - The text settings information object. SpenSettingTextInfo
        Since:
        3.0.0
